content: What iconic monument, completed in 1889, serves as a global cultural icon of France and is one of the most recognizable structures in the world?

Ah, you're referring to the Eiffel Tower, right? It's an iconic symbol of France and one of the most visited monuments in the world. Built for the 1889 Exposition Universelle (World's Fair), it was initially criticized by some of France's leading artists and intellectuals for its design, but it has since become a beloved part of Paris's skyline. The Eiffel Tower stands at over 300 meters tall and offers breathtaking views of the city. It's amazing how it has become such an integral part of French culture and identity.
